t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - Some big-name consumer brands have long worried that selling on Amazon would devalue their products or hurt their reputations — LVMH, Ralph Lauren, and Patagonia don’t sell on the platform, for example — and while their concerns aren’t unfounded, they’re probably slightly misplaced.
